effect.scarlet_violet: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.
